# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| main    | :white_check_mark: |

We currently support the latest code on the `main` branch.

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you believe you have found a security vulnerability, please report it responsibly:

1. **Do not** open a public issue.
2. Open a [private security advisory](https://github.com/NorthernL1ghts/Leaf/security/advisories/new) on this repository, or contact the maintainers directly if you prefer.
3. Include a clear description, steps to reproduce, and impact if possible.
4. Allow time for a fix before any public disclosure.

We will acknowledge your report and work with you to understand and address the issue.
